issue.title: [CF 1369] Shield Block tracking with tier 19 2-set bonus
issue.body:
With Protection Warriors 2-set bonus the Warrior gains another buff while Shield Block is active. The ID of the new spell is 212236 and the name of it is also Shield Block.

 

My (updated) Tellmewhen does not track the original timed Shield Block instead it tracks the new and therefore does not show any timer.

 


> Posted by CurseForge user TheNerfer | Imported from CurseForge issue #1369 | Raw

comments.body:
Instead of "Shield Block", use "132404" for tracking the Shield Block buff. This works for my prot. warrior. 

Edited Jan 26, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user BongKim

BongKim

It worked! I already tried to make it track other spell IDs for Shield Block but i guess i missed that one. Thank you so much

 

Cyberloras

Sorry i didnt removed the tags. Haven't noticed the answers before now.

Keep up the good work!

 

Edited Jan 29, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user TheNerfer
